attributes.action: Stop Parlimentary & Independent Enquiries - Start Prosecuting People
attributes.additional_details: Could we please stop wasting public money on Parlimentary and Independent enquiries into scandals such as 'Phone Hacking' & the 'LIBOR Rate Fixing' and start using our police forces and justice system to start prosecuting senior business executives who break the law. The Public has no interest seeing these enquiries played out in a public forum but do want to know that those incriminated are brought to justice.
